𔗘 mi mat 𒆳 medina 𜏔 m… 𜏠 ma 𜎥𜎦 me 𜓚 mi 𜎎𜎐 mo 𜎷 mu 𔗗 𐙁 MA 𔗗𔗎𔗏𔗐𔓯𔐤 •ma.di.ni.i.na medina™ "stronghold" 𔗖 𔔂𔖻 mi… 𔔂 #URBS city QED 𔔃𔔄𔔅 𓏚 𓏙 𒆠 𓊖 𒆳 𔘙 ger dagger 𔔆 #REGIO reign => "century" kingdom 𔐑-tum /tu/ 2 𔔇 𔔈 𓈋 dual

𓊖 KAR KUR > 𒂦 SIR3 शहर śahr city

𒈠𒁖𒌅 ma-dak-tu fortress medigna medina

City-List

Chogha Mish Tappeh-ye Choghā Mīsh (Persian language; چغامیش čoġā mīš) dating back to 6800 BC, is the site of a Chalcolithic settlement in Western Iran. 6900 BCE (Archaic Susiana) to 5000 BCE (the Middle Susiana period).

𒌷 𒁁𒇻𒋾 URU be-lu-ti Cur Belati ≈ Car Pitale > capital city

𒈠𒄩𒍪 𒃲𒌑 ma-ha-zu rab-u2 medina mahas gravitu "big city"

city tablets / covenant

Kudurrus dālu "water buckets" (round / cylindrical / globular ) banduddû "water buckets" held by "apkallu" eagle-men "wise sages" <≈ abgal cone female date palm flower cluster to pollinate the male (still done today)
